name: Collaborative Sorting Task
description: Sort objects into designated goal zones. Human and AI work together.

role_instructions.robot: Sort the objects in the boxes as instructed by the human operator. In general, move the larger boxes before the smaller ones. Ensure that the boxes are entirely inside the designated zones. The human and AI will work together in roughly the same space. Avoid colliding with the human. If unsure, ask for clarification.
role_instructions.human: Move objects to your goal zone. The robot will assist with remaining objects.

start.name: Initialize
start.description: Observe scene and identify all objects

clarify_sorting.name: Clarify Sorting Rules
clarify_sorting.description: If sorting rules unclear, ask human for clarification

sort_object_1.name: Sort First Object
sort_object_1.description: Move first available object to goal

sort_object_2.name: Sort Second Object
sort_object_2.description: Move second available object to goal

sort_object_3.name: Sort Third Object
sort_object_3.description: Move third available object to goal

sort_object_4.name: Sort Fourth Object
sort_object_4.description: Move fourth available object to goal

verify_complete.name: Verify Completion
verify_complete.description: Check all objects are in correct zones
